fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Trade, Energy, Food Safety
eu_initiatives: Graphic Packaging is a manufacturer and seller of paperboard and paperboard cartons. We are a leader in the US and European market place and the paperboard that we use is both virgin and recycled. We are currently following Mineral Oil regulation in Germany and Biomass Energy policies in the UK and throughout Europe.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
American Forest & Paper Association 
European Carton Makers Association
relevant_communication:
Mineral Oil regulation and policy has implications on our paperboard cartons. 
 
Biomass energy policies has implications on our ability to compete in the US market for wood where biomass pellet facilities are being established to manufacture and export biomass pellets to Europe.
goals__remit: Graphic Packaging's goals is to understand EU and member country policy and how that policy impacts our company. We want to share information on the impacts to help develop optimal policy.
